00015 class DistanceArray2{
00016 public:
00017   typedef std::vector< std::vector<const my_float_t *> > bin_vec;
00018   typedef bin_vec::iterator bin_vi;
00019   typedef bin_vec::const_iterator bin_vci;
00020 
00021   typedef std::multimap<bin_vci, const my_float_t*> bin2vert_mmap;
00022   typedef bin2vert_mmap::const_iterator bin2vert_mmci;
00023 
00026   DistanceArray2()
00027   { init(); }
00028 
00029   DistanceArray2(const my_float_t *positions, const uint num_pos,
00030                  const my_float_t bin_width)
00031   {
00032     init();
00033     setup_grid(positions, num_pos, bin_width);
00034   }
00035   
00036   ~DistanceArray2() {;}
00037 
00038   void
00039   setup_grid(const my_float_t *positions, const uint num_pos, 
00040              const my_float_t bin_width)
00041   {
00042     if(A_bins_are_setup){
00043       std::cerr << "Bins are already setup - cannot set them up again\n";
00044       return;
00045     }
00046     A_bin_width = bin_width + 0.01;
00047     A_bin_width_inv = 1.0 / bin_width;
00048     //A_max_dist = max_dist;
00049 
00050     my_float_t min_pos[3], max_pos[3];
00051     get_min_max_coords(positions, num_pos, min_pos, max_pos);
00052     determine_space(min_pos, max_pos, A_lower_corner, A_upper_corner, 
00053                     A_num_bins);
00054     populate_grid(positions, num_pos, A_bin_width, &A_bins);
00055 //    A_bins_for_moved_pts->resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00056     A_bins_are_setup = true;
00057   }
00058 
00059   void 
00060   get_min_max_coords(const my_float_t *positions, const uint num_pos,
00061                      my_float_t *min_pos, my_float_t *max_pos)
00062   {
00063     std::copy(positions, positions + 3, min_pos);
00064     std::copy(positions, positions + 3, max_pos);
00065     const my_float_t *pos_end = positions + 3*num_pos;
00066     for(const my_float_t *pos = positions; pos < pos_end; pos += 3)
00067       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00068         if(max_pos[i] < pos[i]) max_pos[i] = pos[i];
00069         if(pos[i] < min_pos[i]) min_pos[i] = pos[i];
00070       }
00071   }
00072 
00073   void
00074   determine_space(const my_float_t *min_pos, const my_float_t *max_pos,
00075                   my_float_t *min_corner, my_float_t *max_corner, int *num_bins)
00076   {
00077     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i){
00078       min_corner[i] = 
00079         A_bin_width * std::floor(min_pos[i] / A_bin_width) - 2*A_bin_width;
00080       max_corner[i] = 
00081         A_bin_width * std::ceil(max_pos[i] / A_bin_width) + 2*A_bin_width;
00082       num_bins[i] = 
00083         static_cast<int>(std::ceil((max_corner[i] - min_corner[i]) 
00084                                    / A_bin_width));
00085     }
00086   }
00087 
00088   void
00089   populate_grid(const my_float_t *positions, const uint num_pos,
00090                 const my_float_t bin_width,
00091                 std::vector< std::vector<const my_float_t*> > *bins)
00092   {
00093     std::cout << A_num_bins[0] << " X " << A_num_bins[1] << " X " 
00094               << A_num_bins[2] << std::endl;
00095 
00096     bins->resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00097     A_current_bin_idz.resize(A_num_bins[0]*A_num_bins[1]*A_num_bins[2]);
00098 
00099     std::cout << "number of bins: " << A_bins.size() << std::endl;
00100     const my_float_t *pos_end = positions + 3*num_pos;
00101     for(const my_float_t *p = positions; p < pos_end; p += 3){
00102       int idx[3];
00103       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00104         idx[i] = static_cast<int>(std::floor((p[i] - A_lower_corner[i]) * 
00105                                              A_bin_width_inv)); 
00106 
00107 //      std::cout << "bin idz " << idx[0] << " " << idx[1] << " " 
00108 //                << idx[2] << std::endl;
00109 
00110       // add p to the 27 bins (the computed index and +/- 1 for each coordinate)
00111       A_current_bin_idz.push_back(idx[0] * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2] +
00112                                   idx[1] * A_num_bins[2] + idx[2]);
00113 
00114       for(int i = -1; i < 2; ++i){
00115         bin_vi cbin = A_bins.begin();
00116         cbin += (idx[0] + i) * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2];
00117         cbin += (idx[1] - 1) * A_num_bins[2];
00118         for(int j = -1; j < 2; ++j){
00119           for(int k = -1; k < 2; ++k){
00120 # if 0
00121             std::cout << "try this: " 
00122                       << ((idx[0] + i) * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2] +
00123                            (idx[1] + j) * A_num_bins[2] + (idx[2] + k))
00124                       << " "
00125                       << (A_bins.begin() + 
00126                           ((idx[0] + i) * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2] +
00127                            (idx[1] + j) * A_num_bins[2] + (idx[2] + k))) - A_bins.begin() << "\n";
00128             std::cout << "pushing back to bin # " << (cbin+k) - A_bins.begin()
00129                       << " " << (idx[0] + i) << " " << (idx[1] + j)
00130                       << " " << idx[2] + k << "\n";
00131 #endif
00132             (cbin + idx[2] + k)->push_back(p);
00133           }
00134           cbin += A_num_bins[2];
00135         }
00136       }
00137     }
00138 
00139 #if 0
00140     int cnt = 0;
00141     for(bin_vci bin = A_bins.begin(); bin < A_bins.end(); ++bin, ++cnt){
00142       if(bin->size() > 0) std::cout << "bin " << cnt << " has " << bin->size() 
00143                                     << " entries\n"; 
00144     }
00145 #endif
00146 
00147   }
00148 
00149   bin_vci
00150   get_bin(const my_float_t *pt) const
00151   {
00152     // First check if point is outside of bin ranges
00153     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00154       if(pt[i] < A_lower_corner[i] || A_upper_corner[i] < pt[i])
00155         return A_bins.end();
00156 
00157     int idx[3];
00158     for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00159       idx[i] = static_cast<int>(std::floor((pt[i] - A_lower_corner[i]) * 
00160                                            A_bin_width_inv)); 
00161 #if 0
00162     std::cout << "pt is in bin idz " << idx[0] << " " << idx[1] << " " << idx[2] << "\n";
00163     std::cout << "pt is in bin # " 
00164               << idx[0] * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2] + idx[1] * A_num_bins[2] + idx[2] << "\n";
00165 #endif
00166     return A_bins.begin() + (idx[0] * A_num_bins[1] * A_num_bins[2] +
00167                              idx[1] * A_num_bins[2] + idx[2]);
00168   }
00169 
00170   void
00171   get_bins(const my_float_t *vert_begin, const uint num_vert, 
00172            bin2vert_mmap *pts_in_bins) const
00173   {
00174     const my_float_t *vert_end = vert_begin + 3*num_vert;
00175     for(const my_float_t *v = vert_begin; v < vert_end; v += 3){
00176       pts_in_bins->insert(std::pair<bin_vci, const my_float_t*>(get_bin(v), v));
00177     }  
00178   }
00179 
00181   inline bin_vci
00182   bins_end() const
00183   { return A_bins.end(); }
00184                 
00185 
00186 private:
00187   void
00188   init()
00189   {
00190     //A_max_dist = my_float_max;
00191     A_bin_width = my_float_max;
00192     std::fill(A_upper_corner, A_upper_corner + 3, 0.0);
00193     std::fill(A_lower_corner, A_lower_corner + 3, 0.0);
00194     std::fill(A_num_bins, A_num_bins + 3, 0);
00195     A_bins_are_setup = false;
00196   }
00197 
00198 //  my_float_t A_max_dist;  //!< Maximum distance for grid to be valid
00199   my_float_t A_bin_width; 
00200   my_float_t A_bin_width_inv; 
00201   my_float_t A_upper_corner[3];
00202   my_float_t A_lower_corner[3];
00203   int A_num_bins[3];
00204   bin_vec A_bins;
00205   std::vector<int> A_current_bin_idz;
00206   bin_vec A_bins_for_moved_pts;
00207   bool A_bins_are_setup;
00208 };
